description:
When you have a culture that condones a lack of accountability and promotes the foolish claim that people committing crimes are the real victims, you get this story.

A high school student in North Carolina went on an unhinged rant where he was acting like those homeless crackheads who scream random things, as he proceeded to slap his teacher in the face TWICE. However, this student was actually charged and we can only hope that he will be held accountable for his reprehensible behavior. Although, he has yet to be expelled even though he should never be allowed back on that campus.

Warning: This video may be upsetting to some people.

‚Äî (@)
title: Watch: High School Student Goes On Profanity Rant Before Slapping Teacher In The Face Twice
